entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
